meanings.sent1: The soil in this area is nonnitrogenous, lacking any nitrogen content.
meanings.sent2: The nonnitrogenous fertilizer is safe to use on plants that do not require nitrogen.
meanings.sent3: The nonnitrogenous air in the room made the plants feel out of place.
meanings.sent4: Her nonnitrogenous diet consisted mainly of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The nonnitrogenous environment was perfect for growing certain types of flowers.

meanings.definition: Not related to or derived from nitrogen.
meanings.sent1: The scientist discovered a nonnitrogenous compound that could replace nitrogen-based ones.
meanings.sent2: The nonnitrogenous materials used in the experiment were completely synthetic.
meanings.sent3: The nonnitrogenous topic of conversation left everyone puzzled.
meanings.sent4: His nonnitrogenous research opened up new possibilities in the field of chemistry.
meanings.sent5: The nonnitrogenous approach to farming proved to be innovative and effective.
